tasks.title: Refactor CLI Skill Path
tasks.description: Modify `src/cli/skill.rs` to use `.cratos/skills` as the default directory for generated skills.

tasks.title: Develop Migration Script
tasks.description: Create a Python script (`scripts/migrate_skills.py`) to scan `.agent/skills` and `.claude/skills`, compare contents/names, and move unique/new skills to `.cratos/skills`.

tasks.title: Execute Migration
tasks.description: Run the migration script and verify that skills are correctly moved and deduplicated.

tasks.title: Clean Up Old Directories
tasks.description: Remove empty `.agent/skills` and `.claude/skills` directories after verification.

tasks.title: Update Skill References
tasks.description: Scan migrated skills for references to `.agent/skills` and update them to `.cratos/skills`.

tasks.title: Deduplicate Skills
tasks.description: Identify and remove low-quality duplicate skills (stubs) in favor of established ones.

tasks.title: Analyze Persona Definitions
tasks.description: Locate Persona definitions and identify missing skill references.

tasks.title: Fix Pantheon Skills
tasks.description: Update Pantheon config files to use validated, existing skills from .cratos/skills.

tasks.title: Implement Prune CLI
tasks.description: Add `cratos skill prune` command with --dry-run and --confirm flags.

tasks.title: Automate Stale Skill Pruning
tasks.description: Integrate skill pruning into the Cratos scheduler as a recurring system task.
